title: Cognitive Load Management Strategies for Improving Job Efficiency in Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Recognizing various cognitive load factors experienced by administrative/managerial professionals during work and acquiring practical strategies for managing them

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish between intrinsic, extraneous, and germane cognitive loads occurring in workplace environments
Learners can classify their own workload into three or more levels using a real-time load measurement tool via smartphone apps
Learners can apply five practical strategies (e.g., task segmentation, environmental optimization) to mitigate cognitive load in actual work settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
